comment.author: 90832828@N00
comment._content:
The house and bothy are now gone.
An art deco outdoor swimming pool was built there in the 30's.
Its sadly now derelict.

comment.author: 68471901@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Banff, Macduff and Around About, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: The bothy is still there, but damaged. The pool is on the other side of the cove. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tarlair_Swimming_Pool Streetview: maps.google.com/maps?q=loc:57.671,-2.47&hl=en&ll=...
